➤ Feb 2019 - Jul 2019

Smart Traffic

This web application gives a solution for detecting traffic violations by using machine learning and defined rules. It also allows administrators to manage cameras, violations, rules and statistics.

Responsibilities:

● Design structure of frontend source code.

● Improve UI/UX.

● Improve performance.

Technologies used in project:

● HTML, CSS, JavaScript.

● Reactjs/Redux thunk.

● Django.

● Django REST framework.

● Git.

Achievements:

● Restful API knowledge

● Experience in Reactjs/Redux

● Experience in estimate task.

● Ability in teamwork.
